index.description: Fronteers is a Dutch non-profit trade organisation for front end developers. They organize monthly meetings, workshops and the annual Fronteers Conference.

oocss.description: A talk about using Object Oriented CSS to create a flexible and powerful framework for the Dutch National Museum website.

rijksmuseum.description: The challenges Remco Veldkamp encountered when developing the responsive site for the collection of the Dutch National Museum.

accessibility-is-ux-design.description: A talk about accessability and usability issues.
